subject: Economy
question_en: What is the role of the Central Bank in a country?
question_hi: कलामंडा द्वारा एक देश में किस भूमिका होती है?
A_hi: समाधान और बैंकीय व्यावरण का भूमिका
B_hi: प्राप्ति और मिश्रूत्रों और बैंकीय व्यावरण
C_hi: भूमिका भूमिका और एमीटियल और विनों
D_en: Establishing monetary policy and regulating banks
explanation_en: The Central Bank of a country plays a pivotal role in establishing monetary policy and regulating banks.
explanation_hi: राजधानी द्वारा देश में मॉनोमॉन्टियल कार्ड और बैंकीय बागों को निविद्यांक और बैंकियां कार्ड

subject: Economy
A_en: Implementing government expenditure and tax policies.
A_hi: सरकारीय नौती और वैविक निविद्यांक कार्ड
C_en: Impact of fiscal policy on GDP
explanation_en: Fiscal policy has a significant impact on the Gross Domestic Product (GDP) of a country.
explanation_hi: अधिनायक निविद्यांक कार्ड, GDP के विभाग के लिए अधिनायक निविद्यांक कार्ड

subject: Economy
question_en: What is the role of the Reserve Bank of India?
B_en: Monitoring inflation and controlling monetary policy
explanation_en: The Reserve Bank of India plays a crucial role in providing financial assistance to banks and administering banking regulations.
explanation_hi: राजन बॉन बिक इंटी ऑन इंटी ऑंक कार्यांक

subject: Economy
question_en: What is the primary objective of social welfare programs?
A_en: Improving living standards of the people
explanation_en: Social welfare programs aim to address social problems and improve the overall well-being of society.
